00040   public static function setOptions( IXLComponent $object, array $options )
00041   {
00042     if ( ! is_object( $object ) )
00043       return;
00044 
00045     foreach ( $options as $_key => $_value )
00046     {
00047       $_method = 'set' . self::_cleanKey( $_key );
00048 
00049       if ( is_callable( array( $object, $_method ) ) )
00050         $object->$_method( $_value );
00051     }
00052   }
00053 
00059   public static function setConstructorOptions( IXLComponent $object, $options )
00060   {
00061     if ( $options instanceof CXLConfig )
00062       $options = $options->toArray();
00063 
00064     if ( is_array( $options ) )
00065       self::setOptions( $object, $options );
00066   }

00076   public static function loadConfiguration( IXLComponent $object, $options = array(), $overwriteExisting = true )
00077   {
00078     XL::logDebug( 'Loading configuration options: ' . print_r( $options, true ), $object::CLASS_LOG_TAG );
00079 
00080     //  Get a handle on the options to modify
00081     $_objectOptions = $object->getOptions();
00082     
00083     //  Make a copy for posterity
00084     if ( $overwriteExisting || empty( $_objectOptions ) )
00085       $_objectOptions = $options;
00086     else
00087       $_objectOptions = array_merge( $_objectOptions, $options );
00088     
00089     $object->loadOptions( $_objectOptions );
00090 
00091     //  Try to set each one
00092     try
00093     {
00094       foreach ( $options as $_key => $_value )
00095       {
00096         try
00097         {
00098           //  See if __set has a better time with this...
00099           if ( is_callable( array( $object, 'set' . $_key ) ) )
00100             $object->{'set' . $_key}( $_value );
00101           else if ( property_exists( $object, $_key ) )
00102             $object->{$_key} = $_key;
00103         }
00104         catch ( Exception $_ex )
00105         {
00106           //  Completely ignore errors...
00107         }
00108       }
00109     }
00110     catch ( Exception $_ex )
00111     {
00112       XL::logError( 'Exception while loading configuration options: ' . $_ex->getMessage(), $object::CLASS_LOG_TAG );
00113       return false;
00114     }
00115     
00116     return true;
00117   }
00118

00128   protected static function _cleanKey( $key )
00129   {
00130     return str_replace( 
00131       ' ', 
00132       '', 
00133       ucwords( 
00134         str_replace( 
00135           '_', 
00136           '', 
00137           strtolower( $key )
00138         )
00139       )
00140     );
00141   }
